title: Google\Cloud\Asset\V1\IamPolicyAnalysisQuery
name: IamPolicyAnalysisQuery
description:
IAM policy analysis query message.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.asset.v1.IamPolicyAnalysisQuery

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.scope
params.description: Required. The relative name of the root asset. Only resources and IAM policies within the scope will be analyzed. This can only be an organization number (such as "organizations/123"), a folder number (such as "folders/123"), a project ID (such as "projects/my-project-id"), or a project number (such as "projects/12345"). To know how to get organization id, visit here . To know how to get folder or project id, visit here .

params.name: data.access_selector
params.description: Optional. Specifies roles or permissions for analysis. This is optional.

params.name: data.condition_context
params.description: Optional. The hypothetical context for IAM conditions evaluation.
